pins.pin_description: Important open problem alerts related to NSX-T entities
pins.pin_query: open problem where Alert Tags =  'NSX-T' group by name, severity

pins.pin_description: This pin will show you any changes in the L3 topology and neighborhood in NSX-T
pins.pin_query: change alert where message = 'Entity type VRF properties updated' and changedProperties.propertyPath in ('neighborVRFs', 'defaultNextHopRouterInterfaces')
